title: Factor and Complete the Square
text: Factor out 9: 9(x**2-6x + y**2-6y) $$=$$ $$-81$$. Complete the square for both $$x$$ and $$y$$.

title: Recognize the Circle Form
text: After completing the square: $$\left(x-3\right)^2$$ + $$\left(y-3\right)^2$$ $$=$$ $$9$$ is a circle with radius $$3$$.
